long_description: Compact, sturdy and fumble-free, the 1.1 in. diameter Nite Ize KeyRing steel keychain comes with 6 stainless-steel S-Biners to keep your keys secure, convenient and easy to access. A simple, handy and secure way to organize your keys, this solid stainless-steel ring comes with six #.5 stainless-steel S-Biners to hold 6 separate keys. Use one of the S-Biners to attach the whole unit to a second key ring, belt loop, purse strap or zipper pull. Secure S-Biners attach and detach quickly, making it easy to share keys with family, valets and babysitters or to take a single key with you when you're playing outside.
short_description: Compact, sturdy and fumble-free, the 1.1 in. diameter Nite Ize KeyRing steel keychain comes with 6 stainless-steel S-Biners to keep your keys secure, convenient and easy to access.
